projects.title: Shortify ‚Äì Custom URL Shortener with Visit Analytics
projects.description: Shortify is a work-in-progress URL shortener built using Spring MVC and Thymeleaf, designed to go beyond simple redirection by capturing meaningful visit analytics. The application demonstrates backend craftsmanship, modular design, and real-world deployment readiness.

projects.title: DIGIQA ‚Äì Digital Quality Assurance Platform
projects.description: DIGIQA is a full-stack web application developed in collaboration with the Quality Assurance Cell at Mohamed Khider University of Biskra.
